name: Respawn (MWainwright)
description:
A game set in a ravaged pocket timeline, the only thing not stricken by the decay and distortion of time is YOU, traverse the floating masses of this world, armed with an improvised junk cannon on your chest that can harm you as much as it hurts your enemies, to find the only way out, the key being your death and revival.

Time resurrects you on and on to fight while the broken remains of your past selves infest the surrounding environment. Use the junk from enemies and the environment to stay alive, solve the puzzles of the destroyed complex around you to head for the stars and escape!

Creators:

Connor Mcmillan - Lead Producer, Level Designer, Lead Artist and Animator.
https://www.instagram.com/mcmillan_art/ 

Marc Wainwright - Lead Programmer, Lead Story Narrative writer and Sound engineer.
https://marcwainwright.artstation.com/
